Project Euler: 16 Power Digit Sum

In this one, we want to find the sum of the digits of \(2^{1000}\). I did this naively where I just multiply by 2 every iteration until we reach \(2^{1000}\). Of course to do so in c\(++\), we need to use arrays. Let s hold the result and initialize to 2. Then
